answers.answer: Could be a sign of low iron. Mention it to your doctor at your next apt.

I just went and seen my doctor earlier today. I told her I was always eating ice, and she said my tests came back normal, no anemia, and no diabetes. But she said make sure ur still taking the iron pills because you could still get anemia. So I will take her advice

I crave ice so bad. To the point where I feel nauseous if I don't have it. Crazy huh lol. I do have pretty low iron and need to take iron pills. My doctor says craving ice doesn't necessarily mean that you're anemic but ice is a common craving for anemic pregnant women.
I've never heard that. But I have heard craving dirt means your iron is low. My friend carved dirt do bad and her iron was low. If your tests came back normal I wouldn't worry.
I ate Ice my entire last pregnancy !
They havent tested me since the beginning of my pregnancy

question: I heard craving ice means iron deficiency? Well im 37 weeks and have been craving ice but dont know if its iron or just because its been 90 and humid all week? Should i even worry about it being that im 37 wks already?
title: Craving ice?
